channel.title: Custom Items are Showing up in wrong spots
channel.description: OK sorry if I sound like a complete moron :P But I am just new to moparscape and still getting used to coding. I have a question about custom items, whenever I try to wear one, ex: a golden partyhat. It shows up in the sword spot so I couldn't weild a sword with that partyhat. Anyone know hot to fix this? I think it has something to do with how the item is in the class8.java, but it isn't in the item.cfg in the Source Files. If someone could help that'd be greeeeaaaaaaaatttt.

item.title: Custom Items are Showing up in wrong spots
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

open up the item.java and add the item id under the static int for the type of Item it is.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom Items are Showing up in wrong spots

item.title: Custom Items are Showing up in wrong spots
item.dc:creator: @serpent22 serpent22
item.description:
@serpent22 wrote:

Sorry don’t mean to be a little annoying but just didn’t understand because there was many item classes, but I think I know now, thanks.

Read full topic

item.description:
@airborne wrote:

We won’t spoon-feed you, but open Item.java, and Item4.java, and if you look around, it should be self-explanatory. (I am sorry if this is spoon-feeding him, or his question is not spoon-feeding, I wasn’t that good of a coder, and I was kinda a feed-me-asker.)

Read full topic
